valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Sun 4 Jan 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Mon 5 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low 50 miles west of Rockall 1023 expected Sole 1017 by 1800 Sunday. New low expected Dogger 1001 by same time. Low south Trafalgar 990 moving away slowly eastwards

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, northerly or northeasterly 6 to gale 8 decreasing 4 to 6. In east, cyclonic 3 to 5.
Sea state
In west, very rough becoming rough. in east, moderate or rough.
Weather
Squally snow showers.
Visibility
Good, occasionally very poor.

Gale warning
Issued:

Northerly gale force 8 continuing

Trafalgar.text:
Wind
In southeast, cyclonic 4 to 6, occasionally 7 at first, then becoming northwesterly later. In northwest, northeasterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally 5 at first.
Sea state
In southeast, rough or very rough becoming moderate or rough. in northwest, rough or very rough, occasionally moderate in east.
Weather
In southeast, thundery rain, then showers. In northwest, showers.
Visibility
Moderate or good, occasionally poor at first in southeast.

Gale warning
Issued:
15:51 (UTC) on Sat 3 Jan 2026
Northeasterly gale force 8 expected later

Trafalgar.weather: In southeast, thundery rain, then showers. In northwest, showers.
Trafalgar.visibility: Moderate or good, occasionally poor at first in southeast.
